instruction: Patient has been experiencing a persistent cough for close to six weeks. The cough is mostly dry, with occasional phlegm in the morning. No blood in the phlegm. No fever, chills, or night sweats. Patient experiences slight shortness of breath when climbing stairs. No history of asthma. Partner smokes outside. Recently experiencing more heartburn, which may be contributing to the cough.

attributes.narrative: Patient has been experiencing a persistent cough for close to six weeks. The cough is mostly dry, with occasional phlegm in the morning. No blood in the phlegm. No fever, chills, or night sweats. Patient experiences slight shortness of breath when climbing stairs. No history of asthma. Partner smokes outside. Recently experiencing more heartburn, which may be contributing to the cough.

instruction: Medication for reflux to see if it helps with the cough.

attributes.sig: Take 1 capsule by mouth once daily.
attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense 30 capsules for a 30-day supply. Refill up to 11 times as needed.
